import React from "react"; import FadeIn from "react-fade-in"; import {Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import {Collapse} from 'react-bootstrap'; import firebase from '../config'; class SidebarPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { userRole: '', loading: false, orderStatusList: [] }; } componentDidMount() { this.setState({loading: true}); var sessionId = sessionStorage.getItem("RoleId"); if (sessionId) { console.log(sessionId); firebase .database() .ref('admin_users/' + sessionId) .on('value', snapshot => { var Users = snapshot.val(); console.log(Users); sessionStorage.setItem("userName", Users.fullName); sessionStorage.setItem("userRole", Users.Role); this.setState({userRole: Users.Role, loading: false}); this.ordersSliders(); this.userAuthPerm(); }); } } ordersSliders() { this.setState({loading: true}); var ref = firebase .database() .ref("orderStatus"); ref.on('value', snapshot => { const data = []; snapshot.forEach(childSnapShot => { const orderStatus = { categoryId: childSnapShot .key .toString(), orderStatus: childSnapShot .val() .orderStatus }; data.push(orderStatus); }); this.setState({orderStatusList: data, loading: false}); console.log(this.state.orderStatusList); }); } userAuthPerm() { this.setState({loading: true}); var ref = firebase .database() .ref("Role").orderByChild("Role").equalTo(this.state.userRole); ref.on('value', snapshot => { const data = []; snapshot.forEach(childSnapShot => { const orderStatus = { categoryId: childSnapShot .key .toString(), orderStatus: childSnapShot .val() .orderStatus }; data.push(orderStatus); }); this.setState({orderStatusList: data, loading: false}); console.log(this.state.orderStatusList); }); } render() { return (

); } isPathActive(path) { return this .props .location .pathname .startsWith(path); } } export default withRouter(SidebarPage);
